mapper.select: SELECT fboard_id, fboard_title, fboard_like, user_id, fboard_cnt, fboard_date FROM freeBoard ORDER BY fboard_id DESC

select distinct f.fboard_id, f.fboard_title, f.fboard_content, f.fboard_like, f.fboard_cnt, f.fboard_date, f.user_id, r.user_id as reUserId, r.report_detail, r.report_id, r.report_sort from freeboard f left join report r on f.fboard_id = r.fboard_id where f.fboard_id = #{fboardId} and (r.user_id = #{userId} or r.user_id is null)
mapper.insert:

mapper.update: UPDATE freeBoard SET fboard_cnt = fboard_cnt +1 WHERE fboard_id = #{fboardId}
